trans-unit.source: Represents a geographical location that is determined by latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma localização geográfica determinada por coordenadas de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: May also include altitude, accuracy, speed, and course information.
trans-unit.target: Também pode incluir informações sobre a altitude, a precisão, a velocidade e o curso.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate." />
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate." />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> that has no data fields set.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que não tem nenhum campo de dados definido.

trans-unit.source: All data fields are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os campos de dados são definidos como <xref:System.Double.NaN>.

trans-unit.source: The new instance of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> is equivalent to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância do <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> é equivalente a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor should be used for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor deve ser usado para serialização.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A latitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -90,0 a 90,0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A longitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -180,0 a 180,0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> dos dados de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de latitude e longitude devem corresponder a um local real em todo o mundo.

trans-unit.source: Latitude or longitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: A latitude ou a longitude está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Latitude.
trans-unit.target: Latitude.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -90,0 a 90,0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude.
trans-unit.target: Longitude.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -180,0 a 180,0

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: A altitude em metros.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ser negativo, 0, positivo ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, se for desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude, longitude, and altitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> com base nos dados de latitude, longitude e altitude.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de latitude e longitude devem corresponder a um local real em todo o mundo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" />, or <paramref name="altitude" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" /> ou <paramref name="altitude" /> está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A latitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -90,0 a 90,0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A longitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Pode variar de -180,0 a 180,0.

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: A altitude em metros.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ser negativo, 0, positivo ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, se for desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão das coordenadas de latitude e longitude, em metros.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser maior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> property will be set to <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: Se um valor igual a 0 for fornecido para esse construtor, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> será definida como <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão da altitude, em metros.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser maior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> property will be set to <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: Se um valor igual a 0 for fornecido para esse construtor, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> será definida como <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: The speed measured in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade é medida em metros por segundo.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ser negativo, 0, positivo ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, se for desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: A negative speed can indicate moving in reverse.
trans-unit.target: Uma velocidade negativa pode indicar uma movimentação em ordem inversa.

trans-unit.source: The direction of travel, rather than orientation.
trans-unit.target: A direção do percurso, em vez da orientação.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is measured in degrees relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é medido em graus em relação ao norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: Must range from 0 to 360.0, or be <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: Deve variar de 0 a 360,0 ou ser <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude, longitude, altitude, horizontal accuracy, vertical accuracy, speed, and course.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> com base na latitude, longitude, altitude, precisão horizontal, precisão vertical, velocidade e curso.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" />, <paramref name="horizontalAccuracy" />, <paramref name="verticalAccuracy," /> or <paramref name="course" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" />, <paramref name="horizontalAccuracy" />, <paramref name="verticalAccuracy," /> ou <paramref name="course" /> está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the altitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altitude da <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A altitude, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The altitude is given relative to sea level.
trans-unit.target: A altitude é fornecida em relação ao nível do mar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a direção, em graus, relativa ao norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: The heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: O título em graus, em relação ao norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: The valid range includes values from 0.0 to 360.0, and `Double.NaN` if the heading is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo válido inclui valores de 0,0 a 360,0, e `Double.NaN` se o cabeçalho não está definido.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> properties of the current location's <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> propriedades do local atual <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equivalent, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> são equivalentes, com base apenas na latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object to compare to the calling object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> a ser comparado com o objeto de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object is equivalent to the parameter, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> é equivalente ao parâmetro, com base apenas em latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> propriedades não são usadas para determinar a equivalência.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o qual comparar <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> especificada é igual à <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> atual, com base apenas em latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> propriedades não são usadas para determinar a equivalência.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> for the location to calculate the distance to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> do local para calcular a distância.

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> and another specified <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a distância entre as coordenadas de latitude e longitude especificadas por este <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> e outro <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A distância entre duas coordenadas, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula is used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: A fórmula Haverseno é usada para calcular a distância.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula accounts for the curvature of the earth, but assumes a spherical earth rather than an ellipsoid.
trans-unit.target: A fórmula Haverseno contas para curvatura da Terra, mas presume uma Terra esférica em vez de um elipsoide.

trans-unit.source: For long distances, the Haversine formula introduces an error of less than 0.1 percent.
trans-unit.target: Para longas distâncias, a fórmula Haverseno apresenta um erro de menos de 0,1 por cento.

trans-unit.source: Altitude is not used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: Altitude não é usada para calcular a distância.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para o <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects that are equivalent have the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos que são equivalentes têm o mesmo código de hash.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> propriedades não são usadas para determinar a equivalência.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the latitude and longitude that is given by the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a precisão da latitude e longitude determinadas pelo <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão da latitude e longitude, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy can be considered the radius of certainty of the latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: A precisão pode ser considerada o raio de certeza de que os dados de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: A circular area that is formed with the accuracy as the radius and the latitude and longitude coordinates as the center contains the actual location.
trans-unit.target: Uma área circular que é formada com precisão como as coordenadas de radius e a latitude e longitude como o centro contém o local real.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> does not contain latitude or longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> não contém dados de latitude ou longitude.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> does not contain latitude or longitude data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> não contiver dados de latitude ou longitude; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that does not contain latitude or longitude data is equal to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> que não contêm latitude ou dados de longitude são iguais a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example verifies whether the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that corresponds to a location is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> before printing out its latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir verifica se o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> que corresponde a um local é <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> antes de imprimir seu latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the latitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a latitude do <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: Latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: Latitude do local.

trans-unit.source: Latitude can range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Latitude pode variar de -90,0 a 90.0.

trans-unit.source: Latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
trans-unit.target: Latitude é medida em graus Norte ou Sul, do Equador.

trans-unit.source: Positive values are north of the equator and negative values are south of the equator.
trans-unit.target: Valores positivos são ao norte Equador e valores negativos são Sul, do Equador.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the latitude and longitude values that are obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime os valores de latitude e longitude são obtidos de um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the longitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a longitude do <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: The longitude.
trans-unit.target: A longitude.

trans-unit.source: The longitude can range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: A longitude pode variar de -180,0 a 180.0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: Longitude é medida em graus Leste ou oeste do Meridiano.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are west of the prime meridian, and positive values are east of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: Valores negativos são Oeste do Meridiano e valores positivos são Leste do Meridiano.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the latitude and longitude values that are obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime os valores de latitude e longitude são obtidos de um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects refer to the same location.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> consultam o mesmo local.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are determined to be equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> forem determinados como equivalentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> propriedades não são usadas para determinar a equivalência.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects correspond to different locations.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> correspondem a locais diferentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are determined to be different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> forem determinados como diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> propriedades não são usadas para determinar a equivalência.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a velocidade em metros por segundo.

trans-unit.source: The speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade em metros por segundo.

trans-unit.source: The speed must be greater than or equal to zero, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade deve ser maior ou igual a zero ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> properties of the current location's <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> propriedades do local atual <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the latitude and longitude, separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a latitude e longitude, separadas por uma vírgula.

trans-unit.source: The string representation returned by this method is intended only for debugging use.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres retornada por este método destina-se somente para uso de depuração.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return any locale-specific formatting for latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Este método não retorna qualquer formatação específica de localidade de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object that has unknown latitude and longitude fields.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que tem campos de latitude e longitude desconhecidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A> property can be used to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> contains no data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A> propriedade pode ser usada para verificar se um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> não contém dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example verifies whether the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that corresponds to a location is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> before printingout its latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir verifica se o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> que corresponde a um local é <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> antes de printingout sua latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the altitude given by the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a precisão da altitude fornecida pela <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, em metros.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão da altitude, em metros.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> está definido fora do intervalo válido.
